name: React Weather App
short-description: A simple React App that displays the current weather.
long-description: For my first React App ever I made a simple app that displays the weather of a couple hard coded locations using a weather API. ~design from Dribbble

name: Snype Media Website
short-description: A landing page for Snype Media.
long-description: This landing page was made with vanilla HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

name: Secret Message
short-description: A site for de- and encoding text messages.
long-description: By using different types of white-space chars I am able to convert any text message to binarry and map every 1 to a certain white-char and every 0 to another white-space char. To decode the message I just reverse the process.

name: Snype Photography
short-description: A SaaS product to enhance photo delivery
